document.full_text: pakistan lacks a robust plan to defeat taliban militants and its security forces struggle to hold areas cleared of the al qaeda-linked fighters at great cost, according to u.s. report released on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. doubts pakistan's plan to defeat taliban: report
lines_and_colors: pakistan lacks a robust plan to defeat taliban militants and its security forces struggle to hold areas cleared of the al qaeda-linked fighters at great cost, according to u.s. report released on tuesday.
